title: Community creation crashes the app

labels.name: E:Desktop Bugfixes 0.15
labels.description: Misc bug fixes in Desktop app overall for 0.15

body:
### Description

1. recover account
2. create new community

As result, the app is crashed with the following stacktrace:

```
Traceback (most recent call last)
/Users/anastasiya/status-desktop/src/nim_status_client.nim(208) nim_status_client
```
